full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) - Parts Kit, Check Valve, and Globe Valve

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of parts kit, check valve, and globe valve. The procurement is competitive, open, and will be conducted in accordance with the Defence Contracting Regulations.

### Item 1: Parts Kit, Check Valve

* Part Number: 165-0059-01
* NCAGE Code: 38881
* Quantity: 4 pieces
* Unit of Issue: Kit (KT)
* Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt

### Item 2: Parts Kit, Check Valve

* Part Number: 165-0059-01
* NCAGE Code: 38881
* Quantity: 6 pieces
* Unit of Issue: Kit (KT)
* Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax

### Item 3: Globe Valve

* Part Number: 106-0751
* NCAGE Code: 38881
* Quantity: 8 pieces
* Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
* Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt

### Item 4: Globe Valve

* Part Number: 106-0751
* NCAGE Code: 38881
* Quantity: 8 pieces
* Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
* Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax

## Technical Requirements

Bidder must submit proposals for the above items with the following specifications:

* Equivalent or substitute product proposals must include the brand name and model, or part number and NCAGE code.
* Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will be rejected.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).
